summary: Implements a dataset pipeline that loads audio, resamples to a target rate, tokenizes text, optionally maps speakers, extracts and processes acoustic features, computes alignment priors, filters by duration, applies volume normalization, and produces collated batches for training.
business_intent: Streamline the preparation and feeding of training examples to text‑to‑speech models, supporting multi‑speaker data, weighted sampling, and customizable feature processing.
